wikipedia_page.main: Colonel David John Colville, 1st Baron Clydesmuir,  (13 February 1894 – 31 October 1954), was a Scottish Unionist politician, and industrialist.  He was director of his family's steel and iron business, David Colville & Sons.

link_mentions.page: Order of the Crown of India
response: *1947: Agnes Anne, Baroness Clydesmuir (wife of John Colville, 1st Baron Clydesmuir, Governor of the Presidency of Bombay)
